data.title: Contact GRW and Find Customized Ball Bearing Solutions
data.meta_description: Get in touch with us at GRW: Contact data ✓ address ✓ telephone ✓ e-mail ✓ & many more possibilities to reach out to us online. Contact us now!
data.text:
GRW: Worldwide Leading Supplier and Manufacturer for Ball Bearings

One of our company’s goals is to fulfill our customers’ needs regarding their demand for specialized ball bearings. That is why we offer customized and individually manufactured ball bearing solutions alongside our many standard solutions. Whether our customers need ball bearings that can work under extreme temperatures or they are searching for a product that is resistant to salt – at GRW we design and manufacture the perfect ball bearing for the application. It is important to us, to offer our customers only the best performance to realize their individual wishes

Innovation at GRW: Competence, Developments and New Products

We focus daily to make our ball bearings even better so that we can continue to offer our customers the optimal solution for their application. Therefore, innovation is fundamental to the success of our company: At GRW we are committed to continuous development of new products and consistently look for new perspectives. This ideal is complemented by the competence of our research and development team. Through our teams, innovative ball bearing solutions are being created constantly – customized solutions with focus on to the special requirements of our customers.

GRW Information Desk: All Information Regarding Our Company

At our GRW information desk, you can find all important information about our company. Read up on the current news regarding GRW or find event dates on our trade-fair calendar. Additionally, in our section GRW downloads you can find flyers, whitepapers and our online product catalog. Our press section provides photo galleries, regular press releases and factsheets. Get to know GRW and our team easily through our information desk!

Your Career at GRW – Here Are Your Possibilities

Finding a job in the metal industry with future potential – that’s what GRW can offer you. At GRW, you will find job opportunities in production and manufacturing, development, management and in business functions. As one of the worldwide leading producers of miniature and high-precision ball bearings, we are always searching for motivated and skilled employees. Whether you are starting as an apprentice at GRW or already have graduated from university and bring in experience in your field – here at GRW you can make a difference! Would you like to study and are looking for a company that offers the model for dual course of studies? You’ll be a perfect fit. We welcome students to take a stage at GRW and to gain insights into practical work as well as in challenging projects during their studies.

Did we spark your interest? Don’t wait - apply for one of our many job opportunities now!

We Are Looking Forward to Help You: Contact Our Team at GRW!

Do you have questions regarding our ball bearings, or do you need more information concerning our products? We look forward to hearing from you! Contact GRW via:
